system.requirements: Feral Warrior Alternative Advance, 200xp, WS 35, BS 35
system.effect: Whenever scoring a Critical Effect against a Creature of Hulking Size or Larger, add +3 Damage. Does not apply to servitors, Daemons, or entities with the From Beyond Trait.

description.value: Whenever scoring a Critical Effect against a Creature of Hulking Size or Larger, add +3 Damage. Does not apply to servitors, Daemons, or entities with the From Beyond Trait.
